byline.contributor: Rebecca R. Ruiz contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Swiss officials are investigating FIFA president Sepp Blatter for suspected mismanagement and misappropriation of funds, directly connecting him to ongoing corruption scandal.
lead_paragraph: The inquiry involves Mr. Blatter’s suspected approval of a curiously small contract for World Cup television rights and a surprisingly large payment to another top FIFA official, Michel Platini.

headline.main: Sepp Blatter, FIFA President, Faces Criminal Investigation in Switzerland
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Reaches Into Soccer’s Highest Office

snippet: The inquiry involves Mr. Blatter’s suspected approval of a curiously small contract for World Cup television rights and a surprisingly large payment to another top FIFA official, Michel Platini.
